data.title: Spanish in Valencia
data.text:
Learn Spanish in Valencia, Spain

Valencia, Spain's 3rd largest city, is a lively city situated on the country's eastern Mediterranean coast. When you learn Spanish in Valencia, you'll be surrounded by an extremely active nightlife, an abundance of beaches, delicious seafood and paella and a rich local culture.

Learn more about Valencia:

Valencia Travel Guide

Spanish School in Valencia

Our Valencia Spanish School is set in a great location right in front of the University of Valencia. The best quality services are contained within this comfortable modern building, which also contains a beautiful garden. The area is easily accessible by public transportation as well.

Spanish Courses in Valencia

Accommodations

We want students the students at our Valencia Spanish School to feel as comfortable as possible, so we accordingly provide the following accommodation options:

Host Families

Student Residence

Shared Student Apartments

Private Apartments

Spanish in the World also offers airport pick-up services from the airport to the housing option (see above) of your choice. See the price list for details.
